entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #61048
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #61047
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes #61046
  • Perf improvement: https, single_query #61045
  • Default model binding for form requests consumes body automatically, causing Request Forwarding Issues #61043
  • [OpenAPI] XML source generator does not correctly escape `<see>` tags #61042
  • dotnet-getdocument support OpenAPI YAML format generation #61041
    Backlog
  • [OpenAPI] integers have additional string type with pattern #61038
  • [OpenAPI] error CS0122: 'Type' is inaccessible due to its protection level #61037
  • [OpenAPI] error CS0308: The non-generic type 'TypeName' cannot be used with type arguments #61035
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-generation, fortunes, json #61033
  • Support executing `IApiPublisher` implementors during application run #61031

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Func<Claim, bool>` #56331
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [OpenAPI] generates invalid reference for a type #61039
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, single_query #61012
  • Add method to retrieve current 2FA login provider #60085
    Backlog
  • Blazor [EditorRequired] is a good move but can we get a [EditorBindRequired] as well #61032
  • Non-standard redirect address for Login #61017
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #60984

PullRequests

Created

  • Support generating OpenApiSchemas from transformers #61050
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [release/10.0-preview3] Re-enable WOW64, arm64 forwarders in Hosting Bundle #61049
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure
  • Depend on GetSourceBuildCommandConfiguration target to read from InnerBuildArgs #61044
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in blazorwasm template #61036
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Remove explicit WasmBootConfigFileName from tests #61034
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4

Merged

  • Make signing less custom #61022
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Pass thru command line args to RepoTasks build #61040
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Re-enable WOW64, arm64 forwarders in Hosting Bundle #61026
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove unneeded 'fixed' statements from SocketAddress #61006
    area-networking, reduce-unsafe
  • [release/9.0] Caching SERedis critical bugfix; defer HC metadata detection because of DI cycle #60916
    Servicing-consider, feature-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • feat: fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Support optional and named arguments in Expression trees #9246
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Support generics and generic type parameters in aliases #9245
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Expression blocks #9243
    Working Set

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Support generics and generic type parameters in aliases #1239
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Dictionary expressions: resolve answered questions #9239

Updated

  • Describe scoping rules for extension declaration type parameters and receiver parameter #9229

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Baseline rewriter doesn't handle multiple baseline changes in a single file affecting the number of lines. #35823
  • Operating on Enum Flags using Enum.GetValues result in wrong SQL generated (_ord) #35821
  • Support Shuffle Linq method #35819
    Backlog
  • Using SharedTypeEntity cannot access entity from MemberExpression #35818

Closed

  • Let me opt out from convention which treats Id property of an owned entity as a primary key. #35789
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient is not supported on this platform. #35810
  • Queries regarding the usage of Microsoft.Data.SqlClient AccessTokenCallback in EFCore #35812
  • Bogus CA1847 Warnings #35820
  • Unable to create migration bundle on windows-2022 agent image caused by locked files #35802
  • Exceptions thrown when calling EnsureCreated in debugger when all Break When Thrown is set #35814
  • Unable to customize table jsonb column name using .ToJson() (owned entity mapping) #35815
  • "Alter column" not including schema in statement #35817

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/10.0-preview3] Prevent Cosmos tests from running #35822
    tell-mode

Merged

  • [TEST ONLY] Move AdHocJsonTests to core, so that they also run for Cosmos #35808

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid Android Throws Exception Not Supported Picture-In-Picture(PIP) #28544
  • Application won't run #28543
  • [.NET 9 regression] CollectionView Scroll Bar broken sizing #28542
  • CollectionView2 Header Overlaps Items on iOS When Resized #28541
  • EventArgs.Cancel does not prevent navigation when canceling on OnNavigating event. #28539
    Backlog
  • MAUI and Razor components abstracted as a separate class library fail to build in .NET 10 Previews whereas .NET 9 works fine #28537
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Navigation breaks `VisualState` styles for `Picker`. #28536
    Backlog
  • VisualState does not obey style hierarchy rules #28535
    Backlog
  • Just looking at this and I think that this is all Java code so we probably should just do it in Java and let the bonding do the magic. #28532
    .NET 9 SR6
  • [Catalyst] CanMixGroups Set to False Still Allows Reordering Between Groups in CollectionView #28530
    Backlog

Closed

  • Make `IsVisibleCore` and `RefreshIsVisibleProperty` visible in .NET 10 #27739
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Documentation issue] Page.DisplayAlert wrong documentation (Task vs Task<bool>) #28517
    Backlog
  • CollectionView inside a Grid, various problems #12584
    Backlog
  • [iOS][Android] BlazorWebView not releasing resources after page closes in .NET 8 #28475
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix: Modal Animation Repeats When Returning from Background #28538
    platform/android 🤖, area-core-lifecycle, community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Fix HideSoftInputOnTapped Not Working Net9 #28534
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests Issue18896 and disable Issue14471 test which fails in CI randomly #28533
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [NET10] Replace the obsolete RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel #28531
    area-blazor, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fixed the issue with SearchBar focus and unfocus events. #28529
    community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Scrollview.ScrollTo execution only returns after manual scroll #28528
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [.Net10] Make IsVisibleCore and RefreshIsVisibleProperty visible #28139
    t/breaking 💥, area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [NET10.0] Fix parameter name for `ScrollViewerExtensions.UpdateScrollBarVisibility` #28255
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [NET10.0] Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28244
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Documentation] Page.DisplayAlert wrong documentation (Task vs Task<bool>) - fix #28521
    area-docs, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [inflight/current] [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests Issue18896 and disable Issue14471 test which fails in CI randomly #28540
  • ViewExtensions Async suffix consistency #28506
    t/breaking 💥, area-animation, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6

Updated

  • Update CommunityToolkit.Maui & Mvvm reference in template #28510
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed ScrollView Orientation Neither issue #27231
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Remove PlatformWrapperView.java setHasShadow #28245
    t/breaking 💥, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [.NET 10] More public APIs related with Entry and Editor, pending TODOs #28467
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-entry, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Update default value for LineHeight in the ToNSAttributedString method #28027
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fix the FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync() Not Returning Null When Canceled #27961
    t/breaking 💥, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [2025/03/18] In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Fixed the text and icon color issues in the DatePicker when hovering over it. #27147
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Improve VisualState order and prevent sticky Focused visual state #27477
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28513
    area-testing

  • Fixed the Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off in collection view #26947
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion

  • [Android] Top bar item colors - fix #26964

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AnalyzerExecutionContext prevents AssemblyLoadContext from being collected #77719
  • API for IgnoredDirectiveTrivia #77697

Closed

  • Nullable Attribute on not-null string property when multiple Nullable strings are on the class #77703
  • Source Generator ordering #77560
  • Stack overflow in `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Binder.BindBinaryPattern` when getting compiler diagnostics in Roslyn.sln #73457
    17.13
  • `default` literal of tuple types does not trigger nullability check #77693
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35919.18 #77689

PullRequests

Created

  • Razor EA: load from ServiceHubCore #77720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Generate Documentation - Add loading state #77718
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Null-conditional assignment: Add tests from test plan review #77717
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce likelihood of needing a dual insertion in VS Code #77715
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Remove feature flag for SourceGen execution #77712
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove public facing OOP options. #77711
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • WIP Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Update EA contract for `Implement with Copilot` #77706
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement scoping and shadowing rules for extension parameter and type parameters #77704
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Setup branch for publishing #77702
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Setup branch for test insertions #77701
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update dotnet format instructions #77699
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation, untriaged
  • Add -solution option to build.ps1 #77698
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Parse ignored directives #77696
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Extensions: only look for new extensions in new LangVer #77690
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix copilot layering #77713
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77714
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary dependencies on EditorFeatures from unit test projects #77709
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary package reference from F# EA layer #77710
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change keys for import caching #77627
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove old vs4mac code #77705
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge main to runtime async branch #77700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add FAR support for modern-extension parameters #77503
    Area-IDE, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add support for static extension method completion #77631
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add feature to convert classic extension methods to the new 'extension' form in C# 14. #77660
    Area-IDE, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Remove VisualStudioMetadataReferenceManagerFactory #77686
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77692
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77695
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix CopilotCodeAnalysisService #77691
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: update semantic model APIs #77619
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77721
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch OnAfterPackageLoadedAsync to use a TaskQueue #77687
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove old options related to solution crawler #77625
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Avoid adding duplicate suppressors to the host analyzer arrays #77062
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Extensions: definite assignment and region analysis #77675
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Do not consider `ref` argument to `in`/`ref readonly` parameter as being written to #77682
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • WIP: Remove source generator diagnostic reporting from Workspace #76863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix updating committed solution with insignificant changes #77648
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update maintenance-packages dependencies #77267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to pass Big Endian Unicode to NrbfDecoder.Decode? #113747
  • Allow Multiple Discriminators for the Same Derived Type in System.Text.Json #113744
  • Investigate R2R issue when inlining methods with EH #113742
  • [API Proposal]: DbDataReader - span based column name APIs #113741
  • Bug : regular expressions that never stops matching #113734
  • can not load sos plugin from clion bundled lldb on m3 macOS 15 #113731
  • [API Proposal]: expose TLS client hello message in SslStream #113729
    10.0.0
  • Breaking change in .NET 9 behavior for the ability to allow duplicate attributes in a PFX #113726
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/tls/TestTLSWithLoadedDlls/TestTLSWithLoadedDlls.cmd #113725
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on 3/16/2025 10:54:17 PM +00:00 #113733
  • [browser] MSBuild memory issues #113724
    Future

Closed

  • Linux x64 machine running out of space #113652
    10.0.0
  • Unexpected Behavior with SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenSsl.cs on Mac OS Sonoma 14.4.1 #113186
    Future
  • [Mono] ves_icall_RuntimeType_GetInterfaces generates an extra Implemented Interface #108964
  • [Wasm][net9] MSBuild `EmscriptenVersion` is still 3.1.34 #108972
    9.0.1
  • JIT: Bounds check not elided for inlined function with safe arguments on Windows #112019
    10.0.0
  • JIT doesn't elide bounds checking when iterating over a span and an array of known length #110986
    10.0.0
  • Loops aren't cloned for Spans #82946
    10.0.0
  • [tvOS] XsdDataContractExporterTests.ExporterTypesTests.TypesTest fails #113062
  • [API Proposal]: Vector128.ShuffleNative #81609
    Future
  • Write enumeration perf tests #24915
  • Test Failure: superpmi-asmdiffs-checked-release for smoke_tests.nativeaot #113546
    10.0.0
  • Investigate emitting `movq` for the `CreateScalarUnsafe` helper intrinsics that take a `long/ulong` on x86 #11626
    Future
  • `DOTNET_PreferredVectorBitWidth` is not respected by `Vector<T>` #104978
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `DOTNET_JitBypassAPXCheck` configuration #113748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/10.0-preview3] Revert "Refactor `external_assembly_probe` to be separate from single-file bundle probing" #113746
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Check packedsimd first on browser #113743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono] Fix for issue 109410 #113740
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [cDAC] Resolve breaking change caused by removing ThunkHeap descriptor #113737
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Revert "Reenable ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds test" #113730
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Ignore DefaultCredentials when doing BasicAuth in SocketsHttpHandler #113728
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Set Range header correctly in AddRange #113720
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • ML-KEM: OpenSSL Part 1 #113719
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0] Turn off packages for April #113718
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Fix alignment of whitespace from ShuffleNative PR #113745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Stack walk support more Frame types #112997
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Prevent OS core dump creation for intentionally crashing tests #113732
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Interpreter GC info stage 1: Use templates to specialize gc info encoder/decoder #113223
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Handle missing Vector(128)?<double>.One case in interp #113739
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Revert "Refactor `external_assembly_probe` to be separate from single-file bundle probing" #113738
    area-Single-File
  • Scaffold SLH-DSA based on ML-DSA #113634
    area-System.Security
  • Remove `CryptoConfigForwarder` et al. #112306
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement `ShuffleNative` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Emit revb instructions for BSWAP #112479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 10.0.0
  • Target NetFrameworkCurrent in tests and remove old mentions #113667
    needs-area-label
  • Fixes #108964 [Mono] ves_icall_RuntimeType_GetInterfaces generates add extra Implemented Interface #113721
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: revise escape analysis bit vector usage #113711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Loop cloning for Span #113575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce TP for targets with more than 64 Registers Part 1 #112704
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Apple mobile] Run `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ExporterTypesTests.TypesTest` when `DataSetXmlSerializationIsSupported` is set #113084
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Move unsupported target conditions to IL in mcc tests #112399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Additional support for signal async safe stack-walks. #113645
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Do not report inlining decision to runtime in DEBUG mode #113700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Trigger superpmi-replay pipeline if LSRA files change #113714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve support for 512-bit Vector<T> #111472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Bring up runtime-diagnostics pipeline #113257
    needs-area-label
  • ILLink: Stop giving special treatment to icalls #113704
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix foreign exception handling on Windows #113323
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Change ZipBlocks structs to classes #113453
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Json] Avoid writing to PipeWriter if IAsyncEnumerable throws before first item #113699
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json
  • Draft : Reduce TP by handling liveRegs separately #113713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reset ZLibStreamHandle when parsing concatenated GZip streams #113587
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Allow stack size to be configured for native AOT #110455
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support HasThis calling convention in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #113666
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Passthrough publishing and sourcelink from the outer build #113712
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #113702
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove all explicit GC Poll calls in unmanaged code. #113715
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [RuntimeAsync] Problem with boxing in resume stub when return type is a struct instantiated over object type #3010

PullRequests

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Made Fibonacci tests to actually run Fibonacci algorithm #3050
    area-async

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Project value types with heap-allocated properties as C# classes #3038
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Shipping] Test StoreKit bindings on MacCatalyst #3040
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet restore` fails to invalidate lock file and produce puzzling error messages #47771
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64]The Published Single File generated by "dotnet publish -c Release -r osx-arm64 /p:PublishSingleFile=true /p:IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract=true --self-contained" run failed on Mac OS #47760
  • Dotnet MSBuild: Get Property does not expand properties #47749

Closed

  • C# compiler misses CS8625: Cannot convert null literal to non-nullable reference type error in SDK 8.0.303 and newer #47765
  • Error after upgrading to 8.0.114 on ubuntu 24.04 #47735

PullRequests

Created

  • Try NetCore-Public-Test #47773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove reassignments of `MSBuildAllTargets` property. #47772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Open Test1.cs in Visual Studio, not MSTestSettings.cs #47768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consolidate output paths #47767
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47766
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add instance id to protocol with MTP #47764
    Area-dotnet test
  • Remove erroneous MicrosoftTestingPlatformVersion #47763
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Remove explicit WasmBootConfigFileName from tests #47759
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • dotnet CLI: Update commands folder names #47746
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Adding guidance on what is considered a breaking change in the .NET SDK #45288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Decoupling Visual Studio and the .NET SDK #46477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for March #47710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid using AssetDetails, but FileLength and LastWriteTime directly on StaticWebAsset #47695
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Harden metadata handler invoker against bad metadata #47433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove duplicate nuget packages from asset manifests baseline #47742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Linux-Bionic should build like Android, no rootfs #47739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown
  • Remove `ForceDryRunSigning=true` on Mac & Linux signed builds #47461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds incrementalism to DefineStaticWebAssets #47701
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow winforms binaries in the VMR #47745
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Process C# directives in file-based programs #47702
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Force OCI format for inner images when publishing tarballs or to local docker instances #47398
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.16
  • Allow container targets to be loaded in more scenarios, even if the targets will be skipped #47693
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.16
  • Use CDN Fixes #47503 #47712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .net10 p2 to p3 in the table #47724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
